long_description: Suited to backyard BBQs or lounging on the dock on a sunny afternoon, the women's Buttercup Ball Cap from Pistil tops off your look with bold, colorful style. Cotton/polyester front panel and stretch-polyester mesh back provide lightweight, breathable comfort; internal headband wicks away sweat. Adjustable back closure.
short_description: Suited to backyard BBQs or lounging on the dock on a sunny afternoon, the women's Buttercup Ball Cap from Pistil tops off your look with bold, colorful style.
